headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Quanta Services (PWR) After A 7x Three Year Surge?
summary: If you are wondering whether Quanta Services is priced for perfection or still has room to run, starting with a clear view of its current valuation can help you set expectations. The stock recently closed at US$468.76, with returns of 0.4% over 7 days, 8.1% over 30 days, 6.6% year to date and 31.1% over 1 year. The 3 year return is over 7x, which naturally raises questions about what is already reflected in the price. Recent coverage has focused on Quanta Services as a key player in large...
